reviewText: Save your money. The audio is terrible and you can barely make out what she is saying. The entire video is shot from a single head-on camera position, so you can't see the changes in anyone's position on the bike. The menu system is poor -- you feel like you are always joining something in progress.  There is no talking about goals or methods of improvement.  Compared to the DVDs put out by Robert Sherman these are very, very poor.  Sorry I bought this -- even used.
